medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with one week of abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting with associated diarrhea. He was intubated the evening prior to transfer to OSH. Notable findings included free air on CT scan and acute renal failure.
medical_history.social_history: Patient consumes up to half-a-gallon of whiskey a day; last drink was 8 days ago.
